item.title: Short Bio
item.description: Short Bio English Gabriele Orazi holds a Ph.D. in Brain, Mind and Computer Science (BMCS), with a focus on privacy, obfuscation, cyber forensics, and malware detection. He conducts research at the University of Padua as part of the SPRITZ Security and Privacy Research Group, under the supervision of Prof. Mauro Conti. As part of his Ph.D., he spent six months as a visiting researcher at UCI. Before his doctoral studies, he earned a double Master’s degree in Computer Science (Cyber Security) from the University of Trento and the University of Turku.
